- Integrate blockchain APIs (Web3.js, Ethers.js) to display on-chain data, enabling real-time data visualization

Collaborate with backend team to connect with APIs and ensure task completion.

1. Front-End Development
‚Ä¢ Design and implement a modern, responsive web application front end using React.js.
‚Ä¢ Ensure seamless user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design, optimized for performance, accessibility, and scalability across browsers and devices.
 2. Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) Layer
‚Ä¢ Develop a BFF service layer to serve as the intermediary between the front end and backend systems.
‚Ä¢ Provide optimized APIs, data aggregation, and transformation to ensure efficient communication, performance tuning, and maintainable client-server interaction.
 3. Additional Backend Components
‚Ä¢ Design and implement supporting backend components, including but not limited to:
- Database architecture and schema design for structured and unstructured data.
- System integration with third-party APIs, services, and enterprise systems.
- Security monitoring, and scalability considerations to ensure enterprise-grade robustness.
 4. Backend Algorithm and AI Development (Better to have)
‚Ä¢ Design and implement core backend services, with a strong emphasis on AI-driven capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Key areas include:
- Generative AI (GenAI) integration, including standard Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) frameworks.
- Graph-based RAG approaches to enhance context linking and retrieval accuracy.
- AI Agent development for orchestration, task automation, and reasoning workflows.
- Data intake pipelines to support structured and unstructured data ingestion.
- Information retrieval systems optimized for speed, scalability, and relevance.

Summary:
Highly experienced Senior Data Engineer with 8+ years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining large-scale data platforms. Proven track record of driving platform modernization, building scalable data pipelines, and leading data engineering teams. Skilled in Apache Airflow, Python, Spark, Delta Lake, Snowflake, and Power BI.

Technical Skills:
- Programming languages: Python, Scala, Java
- Data processing frameworks: Apache Spark, Apache Beam
- Data ingestion and orchestration: Apache Airflow, Apache NiFi
- Data storage: Delta Lake, Snowflake, Apache HBase
- Data analytics: Power BI, Tableau
- Operating Systems: Linux, Windows
- Cloud platforms: AWS, GCP, Azure

Professional Experience:
Senior Data Engineer, ABC Corporation (2018-Present)
- Led the design and development of a modern data architecture, resulting in a 300% increase in data processing efficiency
- Built and maintained scalable data pipelines using Apache Airflow and Python, handling 100+ million records daily
- Implemented comprehensive monitoring and alerting using Prometheus and Grafana, reducing data pipeline downtime by 90%
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and optimize data models in Snowflake for analytical workloads
- Mentored junior data engineers and contributed to building a strong data engineering culture

Senior Data Engineer, DEF Startups (2015-2018)
- Developed and maintained large-scale data pipelines using Apache Spark and Scala, handling 500+ million records daily
- Designed and implemented a data ingestion framework using Apache NiFi and Apache Kafka, resulting in a 50% reduction in data latency

Achievements:

Available upon request.
contexts:
Infrastructure Management:
Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable data pipelines to handle large datasets using both on-premise and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
Implement and manage data storage solutions, including databases and data lakes, ensuring data integrity and performance. 
Data Integration:
Integrate data from various internal and external sources such as databases, APIs, flat files, and streaming data.
Ensure data consistency, quality, and reliability through rigorous validation and transformation processes. 
ETL Development: 
Develop and implement ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to automate data ingestion, transformation, and loading into data warehouses and lakes. 
Optimize ETL workflows to ensure efficient processing and minimize data latency. 
Data Quality & Governance: 
Implement data quality checks and validation processes to ensure data accuracy and completeness. 
Develop data governance frameworks and policies to manage data lifecycle, metadata, and lineage. 
Collaboration and Support: 
Work closely with data scientists, AI engineers, and developers to understand their data needs and provide technical support. 
Facilitate effective communication and collaboration between the AI and data teams and other technical teams.
Continuous Improvement:
Identify areas for improvement in data infrastructure and pipeline processes.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies related to data engineering and big data

Design and customize reports.
Modify databases according to requests and perform tests.
Monitoring the data quality of data pipelines, provide data management support to clients.
Liaise with developers to improve applications and establish best practices.
Responsible for building and maintaining optimized and highly available data pipelines that facilitate deeper analysis and reporting.
Developing and implementing data models, data marts for enterprise data lake/data warehouse and integration development process.
Building new Data Analytics solutions to provide insights for decision-making and performance improvements.
Writing effective and scalable ETL processes in building the business‚Äô data collection systems and processing pipelines.
Participate in Agile/Scrum activities: daily standup, demo session, retrospective, estimate and planning, etc.
Provide mentoring/training for junior members if any.
Perform other tasks assigned by the Leader/ Manager.

Key Responsibilities
AI ENGINEER
Work closely as a project team as the main contributor in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Developing scalable AI systems and designing/building algorithms that automate predictive data models.
Creating and managing the AI development and production infrastructure, including automating AI infrastructures for data science teams.
Participating in all phases of AI solutions development, from requirements definition and design to development, deployment, integration, maintenance, performance tuning, and monitoring.
Collaborating extensively with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to define project requirements, ensure seamless progress, and facilitate AI adoption and best practices.
Driving scalability improvements and introducing new capabilities in machine learning platforms, often working across the full stack on tools and infrastructure that empower machine learning teams.
DATA SCIENTIST
Work closely as a project team to lead in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Owns planning of assigned modules, contributes to task breakdown, estimation, and milestone alignment, and supports backlog grooming discussions.
Leads development of a complete module or sub-system (e.g., full model training pipeline or certain solution direction). Can propose solution design, test, and iterate independently. Coordinates with project lead to align with project needs.
Proactively explores and evaluates new tools or methods relevant to the problem domain and integrates them into module-level components with minimal supervision.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Proactive in contributing to the growth of internal capabilities (e.g., training, knowledge-sharing, framework design).
details.ground_truth:
About Galaxy Joy 
Galaxy Joy operates Vietnam's leading loyalty platform, powering the Vietjet SkyJoy program andconnecting over 250 brand partners across thecountry. As we expand across ASEAN,we're building a world-class data infrastructure from the ground up to support real-time transaction processing, partner integrations, and data-driven decision making at scale
Job Description: 
We're looking for a Senior Data Engineer to join our growing data team and play a central role in transforming our data infrastructure into a modern, scalable platform. This is a hands-on leadership position where you'll own critical deliverables, drive architectural decisions, and help establish best practices as we build out our medallion architecture. You'll work across the full data stack, from ingestion and orchestration through transformation andanalytics, and have significant influence over how we design and operate our data platform.
1.Platform Modernization
You will drive the transformation of legacy systems into our modern data architecture. This includes championing engineering best practices such as code reviews, documentation, and testing, as well as mentoring junior team members andcontributing to building our data engineering culture.
2. Data Ingestion and Orchestration
You will design, develop, and maintain robust data pipelines using Apache Airflow and Python. This includes building and optimizing DAGs for ingesting data from brand partners with varying formats anddelivery methods. You'll ensure data quality and reliability at the point of ingestion with proper validation and error handling.
3. Data Transformation and Processing
You will own heavy data transformation workloads, translating complex business requirements into efficient Spark jobs. This involves building and maintaining scalable data pipelines that handle late arriving data, schema evolution, and partner data synchronization. You'll implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting to ensure pipeline health and data freshness, working with Delta Lake for reliable, ACID-compliant data processing.
4. Analytics and Reporting
You will design and optimize data models in Snowflake for analytical workloads. You'll partner with BI teams to ensure data is structured for effective Power BI reporting and self-service analytics, and build aggregation pipelines that support business intelligence and operational reporting needs.

Job Title: Senior Backend Engineer  
Experience Required: 7+ yrs of product development experience  
Skills : 7+yrs working experience with Golang 
Location: Ho Chi Minh 
Work from Office ‚Äì 3 or 4 days per week 
 GO experience is a must. Reactjs and Nodejs is a PLUS!  
 About OOLIO: 
 Founded in 2019, Oolio has rapidly grown into Australia‚Äôs largest hospitality tech 
provider, trusted by industry giants like Star Casinos. Our innovative solutions empower 
businesses to streamline operations, enhance guest experiences, and drive revenue 
growth. 
 With a global footprint, we have established offices in the UK, US, and New Zealand, 
delivering cutting-edge technology to some of the world's most dynamic hospitality 
brands. At Oolio, we‚Äôre not just building software‚Äîwe‚Äôre shaping the future of hospitality 
with innovation, agility, and a passion for excellence. üöÄ 
 As a leading hospitality technology company, delivering innovative solutions that help 
restaurants, cafes, and food service businesses streamline operations, integrate 
ordering and payments, and enhance customer experiences. Our platform is built on 
modern cloud-native technologies and follows an event-driven architecture, enabling 
high scalability and reliability. 
 Responsibilities: 
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain scalable and high-performance web and mobile 
applications. 
‚Ä¢ Work across the stack with Go, React and Node.js. 
‚Ä¢ Working understanding of React Native is a plus. 
‚Ä¢ Architect and optimize APIs and microservices to ensure reliability, scalability, and 
security. 
‚Ä¢ Deploy, monitor, and manage cloud infrastructure using Kubernetes and AWS. 
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to build 
seamless user experiences. 
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews, mentor junior developers, and promote best practices in 
software development. 
‚Ä¢ Continuously improve system performance, observability, and developer 
productivity. 
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and resolve production issues, ensuring uptime and reliability.

Our Tech stack:
Our core services consist hundreds of Golang microservices built around domain oriented, event driven architecture. All run on GCP, GKE, Istio with autoscaling, resiliency and chaos engineering mindset with full end to end observability.
Our mobile platform was running on Android/iOS/Flutter, component based, composable architecture. Web app largely on TypeScript, React, NextJS, Tailwind CSS and composable in-house design components and framework. 
Gitlab for all code repository, CI/CD, with Backstage as centralized developer productivity platform.
DevOps culture, you are fully responsible with design, build, and operate your own services with support from SRE, Platform team as needed
Open source lover, and open source contributor. All tooling and platforms used was in-house custom built on popular open source projects
Embraced engineering culture, and agile development.
Spirit
Accept failures, learn from it and move extremely fast. 
Flexible working environment, and performance-based optimization focus
Ownership and excellent learning opportunity, in-house and external
Be part of the team, who set the trend, influence and build meaningful product to millions of fello Vietnamese

Provide technology leadership to the team and foster engineering excellence.
Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.

contexts:
üîπ Job Summary
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer (Python/Django) to join our engineering team. You will play a key role in designing, building, and optimizing backend systems that are scalable, secure, maintainable, and aligned with long-term product strategy.  You will also mentor junior engineers, participate in architectural discussions, and contribute to solving complex technical challenges across the platform.
üîπ Key Responsibilities
Team Collaboration & Delivery
Participate in daily Scrum meetings; report progress, planned tasks, and blockers.  
Work closely with Design, Frontend, and QC teams to deliver features that meet both business and technical requirements.  
Ensure high code quality by following Clean Code, linting standards, Conventional Commit rules, and ensuring all QC test cases are passed.
System Design & Development
Design, build, and optimize backend architecture for scalability, performance, security, maintainability, and reliability.  
Develop and maintain RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and inter-service communication layers.  
Participate in system improvement initiatives and contribute ideas for architectural enhancement.  
Leadership & Mentorship
Review code, provide feedback, and mentor junior/mid-level engineers.  
Share best practices, guidelines, and technical knowledge with the team.

Job Title: Senior Backend Engineer  
Experience Required: 7+ yrs of product development experience  
Skills : 7+yrs working experience with Golang 
Location: Ho Chi Minh 
Work from Office ‚Äì 3 or 4 days per week 
 GO experience is a must. Reactjs and Nodejs is a PLUS!  
 About OOLIO: 
 Founded in 2019, Oolio has rapidly grown into Australia‚Äôs largest hospitality tech 
provider, trusted by industry giants like Star Casinos. Our innovative solutions empower 
businesses to streamline operations, enhance guest experiences, and drive revenue 
growth. 
 With a global footprint, we have established offices in the UK, US, and New Zealand, 
delivering cutting-edge technology to some of the world's most dynamic hospitality 
brands. At Oolio, we‚Äôre not just building software‚Äîwe‚Äôre shaping the future of hospitality 
with innovation, agility, and a passion for excellence. üöÄ 
 As a leading hospitality technology company, delivering innovative solutions that help 
restaurants, cafes, and food service businesses streamline operations, integrate 
ordering and payments, and enhance customer experiences. Our platform is built on 
modern cloud-native technologies and follows an event-driven architecture, enabling 
high scalability and reliability. 
 Responsibilities: 
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain scalable and high-performance web and mobile 
applications. 
‚Ä¢ Work across the stack with Go, React and Node.js. 
‚Ä¢ Working understanding of React Native is a plus. 
‚Ä¢ Architect and optimize APIs and microservices to ensure reliability, scalability, and 
security. 
‚Ä¢ Deploy, monitor, and manage cloud infrastructure using Kubernetes and AWS. 
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to build 
seamless user experiences. 
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews, mentor junior developers, and promote best practices in 
software development. 
‚Ä¢ Continuously improve system performance, observability, and developer 
productivity. 
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and resolve production issues, ensuring uptime and reliability.

Description
About our Team:
Our team is responsible for creating a brand of new digital financial platforms and apps that are highly reliable and scalable using modern engineering practices. You will be joining a project which talented software engineers in our Digital Bank Build team who is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the new digital banking platform and the customer channels. As part of the team, you will be responsible for implementing software features, involve in technical designs, and writing tests to ensure the high-quality delivery of the product. The teams operate in Scrum and DevOps models.
We‚Äôre looking for top engineers out there! During the interview process, we will test your coding and design skills to assess your experience and depth of knowledge. Don‚Äôt worry our interview process will be fun!
Responsibilities:
As a Java backend engineer, you will be working within a specific problem where you will design, develop, and deploy backend services with a focus on scalability, high availability, and low latency.
Drive the efficient delivery of change through analysis, definition, and documentation of requirements whilst identifying potential solutions using agile delivery frameworks.
Solve complex technical and business problems and learn new technology and frameworks.
Be part of a team that will take full responsibility for the features you own.
Design, develop, test, deploy, monitor, and improve, you are responsible for the full life-cycle of your product ‚Äì build it, own it.
details.ground_truth:
What do we do? 
As a pioneer for digital transformation, GFT develops sustainable solutions across new technologies ‚Äì from cloud engineering and artificial intelligence to blockchain/DLT. With its deep technological expertise, strong partnerships, and comprehensive market know-how, GFT offers advice to the financial and insurance sectors, as well as the manufacturing industry. Through the intelligent use of IT solutions, GFT increases productivity and creates added value for clients. Companies gain easy and safe access to scalable IT applications and innovative business models. 
  Who are we? 
Having started in Germany in 1987, GFT Technologies has grown to become a trusted Software Engineering and Consulting specialist for the international financial industry, counting many of the world‚Äôs largest and best-known banks as our clients. We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but also raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. We have been certified for 2022/23 as a ‚ÄòGreat Place to Work‚Äô in the APAC region. So, if you want to have the opportunity to work with an outstanding and progressive organization, this position could be right for you. 
 Role Summary 
We are looking for experienced and talented (Senior) Backend Engineers to join our global engineering teams and developing and operating our flagship product (Digital Bank platform). 
 Sign-on Bonus: Eligible for candidates who are currently employed elsewhere and able to join GFT before 4th January 2026.
 Key Responsibilities 
Design, develop, implement and maintain Java application
Write high quality, maintainable code using TDD and DDD
Translating user stories into working solution
Design and implement RESTful APIs
Design and implement microservice architecture within the give domain
Work with the distributed team in multiple time zones
Actively participate in Scrum technologies

At OL Vietnam, we have worked alongside our parent company, Orange Logic LLC, to support some of the world‚Äôs largest enterprises with their digital asset management needs. Orange Logic provides a premier Digital Asset Management (DAM) platform that streamlines workflows, enhances collaboration, and ensures compliance across complex digital ecosystems, empowering any team working with digital content the ability to efficiently create, manage, and distribute their content at scale.
 WHAT DIFFERENTIATES ORANGE LOGIC
We are trusted by global leaders to work with over 100 customers, including many of the world's most recognized brands.
Our business is strong and resilient, even in the face of economic challenges. During the Covid economic downturn, we did not implement layoffs or reduce compensation. Instead, we continued to grow, consistently expanding our team and adding dozens of talented members to our R&D department each year.
You‚Äôll work with top engineers and team members who are passionate about building flexible, scalable, and streamlined systems that will define the future of business management.
Job Summary: We are seeking a seasoned Software Architect to establish the architectural vision and technical stewardship for OL Vietnam. In this role, you won't just design systems; you will empower our engineering teams by creating clear architectural principles, patterns, and "paved roads" that enable them to build scalable, secure, and maintainable software with velocity. You will lead by influence‚Äîfacilitating critical design decisions, mentoring engineers, and translating business strategy into a tangible technical roadmap that elevates our entire platform and application landscape.
 Essential Functions:
Architecture Strategy & Governance: Define and evolve the target architecture, principles, tech radar, and roadmaps; steward ADRs; facilitate architecture/design reviews; ensure decisions and trade‚Äëoffs are documented and communicated.
Application Architecture: Lead or facilitate system design for major initiatives; clarify domain boundaries and modularization; guide performance and reliability patterns (caching, concurrency/async, idempotency, retries/timeouts, graceful degradation).
Platform Architecture & Developer Experience: Establish standards for build/packaging, runtime environments, configuration and secrets, and environment promotion (dev/stage/prod); contribute paved paths (templates, reference repos) for CI/CD, release strategies (e.g., canary/blue‚Äëgreen when useful), and fast rollbacks.
Hands-on Leadership & Execution: Lead by example by contributing directly to complex technical challenges, reference implementations, and critical proof-of-concepts. Prove your architectural standards are effective and pragmatic through hands-on implementation.
Containerization & Orchestration: Validate containerization and orchestration approaches during architectural reviews; align implementations with golden paths.
Data & Flow: Align integration and data‚Äëflow patterns; recommend persistence choices (relational/NoSQL/search/cache) appropriate to use cases; ensure backup/restore considerations are in place.
Delivery & Enablement: Create reference implementations and migration plans; mentor engineers and tech leads; raise documentation quality (C4, sequence diagrams, RFCs/ADRs, onboarding guides).
Stakeholder Leadership: Translate business goals into architecture roadmaps with measurable outcomes; collaborate with product, platform/infra, and security teams.
Security & Quality Fundamentals: Champion security by design (authn/z, least privilege, encryption) and the adoption of baseline quality gates within the SDLC by partnering closely with platform and security teams.

 Think like a product engineer: you don‚Äôt just ‚Äúcode a solution‚Äù ‚Äì you build a platform that empowers others to deliver intelligent sys

contexts:
üîπ Job Summary
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer (Python/Django) to join our engineering team. You will play a key role in designing, building, and optimizing backend systems that are scalable, secure, maintainable, and aligned with long-term product strategy.  You will also mentor junior engineers, participate in architectural discussions, and contribute to solving complex technical challenges across the platform.
üîπ Key Responsibilities
Team Collaboration & Delivery
Participate in daily Scrum meetings; report progress, planned tasks, and blockers.  
Work closely with Design, Frontend, and QC teams to deliver features that meet both business and technical requirements.  
Ensure high code quality by following Clean Code, linting standards, Conventional Commit rules, and ensuring all QC test cases are passed.
System Design & Development
Design, build, and optimize backend architecture for scalability, performance, security, maintainability, and reliability.  
Develop and maintain RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and inter-service communication layers.  
Participate in system improvement initiatives and contribute ideas for architectural enhancement.  
Leadership & Mentorship
Review code, provide feedback, and mentor junior/mid-level engineers.  
Share best practices, guidelines, and technical knowledge with the team.

THE ROLE 
We are looking for junior or fresh graduate Python Software Engineers who are excited to build scalable systems, learn modern technologies, and leverage AI-powered development to accelerate engineering work. 
 
You will join our core team to develop components for our research and trading platform, including backend services, data pipelines, automation, and internal tooling. 
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES 
- Build and maintain backend services, automation scripts, and internal tools using Python. 
- Work with structured and unstructured data ‚Äî ingestion, transformation, validation, and storage. 
- Write clean, maintainable, and modular code using Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles. 
- Assist in optimizing performance, reliability, and scalability. 
- Collaborate with researchers to translate ideas into runnable systems. 
- Actively use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, GitHub Copilot, etc.) for coding, debugging, documentation, and design. 
- Participate in code reviews, knowledge sharing, and engineering improvements. 
- Learn and adapt to modern DevOps practices (Git, Docker, CI/CD, cloud or container platforms).

You will be joining a project which talented software engineers in our Digital Bank Build team who is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the new digital banking platform and the customer channels. As part of the team, you will be responsible for implementing software features, involve in technical designs, and writing tests to ensure the high-quality delivery of the product. The teams operate in Scrum and DevOps models.
We‚Äôre looking for top engineers out there! During the interview process, we will test your coding and design skills to assess your experience and depth of knowledge. Don‚Äôt worry our interview process will be fun!
Responsibilities:
As a Java backend engineer, you will be working within a specific problem where you will design, develop, and deploy backend services with a focus on scalability, high availability, and low latency.
Drive the efficient delivery of change through analysis, definition, and documentation of requirements whilst identifying potential solutions using agile delivery frameworks.
Solve complex technical and business problems and learn new technology and frameworks.
Be part of a team that will take full responsibility for the features you own.
Design, develop, test, deploy, monitor, and improve, you are responsible for the full life-cycle of your product ‚Äì build it, own it.

contexts:
We are a global product team focused on building payment and e-commerce solutions that make an impact. We have dedicated our efforts to assisting merchants in running online businesses and reaching customers in every country in the world.
Who Are We Looking For
We‚Äôre looking for a proactive and results-driven Product Manager who thrives in fast-paced environments and is passionate about building impactful solutions. You should be strategic, customer-focused, and execution-oriented ‚Äî capable of translating business needs into product strategy, aligning cross-functional teams, and driving the end-to-end product lifecycle from discovery to launch. If you excel at identifying opportunities, shipping valuable features, and continuously improving products based on data and feedback, this role is for you.
HONESTY and TRUST are core to who we are. We expect transparent and truthful communication from all our team members.
LEARNING and CURIOSITY are essential for growth here. You bring fresh ideas, creativity, and a desire to develop daily, absorbing knowledge from those around you.
Multilingual and Multilingual? Even better. You embrace international collaboration and thrive in global environments. Bonus points if you have cross-border experience or fluency in multiple languages.
Position Overview
As the Product Manager, you will drive the development and enhancement of our AI-powered global identity platform. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver a product that not only meets rigorous compliance standards but also provides an exceptional user experience across our diverse client base spanning 190+ countries.
What You Will Do
Lead the strategic planning and execution platform development, ensuring alignment with our vision of becoming the gold standard in identity verification
Orchestrate the implementation of advanced AI/ML technologies that power our automated verification processes, including state-of-the-art OCR, Face ID, Voice ID, Anti-deepfake, etc
Manage the development of our multimodal verification capabilities spanning ID document processing, face liveness verification, and AML screening across 200+ languages
Coordinate with engineering teams to enhance our microservice architecture, ensuring scalability and flexibility as our user base grows
Drive the continuous improvement of our REST APIs and SDKs for major platforms, facilitating seamless integration for our clients
Collaborate with data scientists and AI specialists to refine our dynamic risk assessment models and ensure they remain at the cutting edge of fraud detection
Balance the implementation of automated verification with human expert oversight to maintain the highest levels of accuracy and integrity
Ensure all platform developments adhere to global compliance standards and prioritize data privacy and security

We are seeking a passionate, detail-oriented Associate Product Owner (APO) to join our team to drive a product development based on Google Cloud, Google Workspace and Gemini AI. Ideal candidates have 2‚Äì3 years of experience after graduation as a Business Analyst in software or enduser projects and aspire to advance into a Product Owner (PO) role in a few years. The APO will bridge business needs and technical execution, working with the businesses to define the roadmap, refine requirements, and translate them into actionable development tasks that deliver measurable business value.
Experience with web or mobile business applications in cloud environments is highly preferred, along with a solid understanding of web, mobile, and database technologies and the stages of modern application development.
Key Responsibilities
As an Associate Product Owner, you will collaborate closely with key stakeholders,and technical teams to ensure the successful design and delivery of solutions that align with business goals.
Product Backlog Management: Work with the Businesses to define, refine, and prioritize backlog items (user stories, features, epics) based on business value, technical feasibility, and alignment with product strategy.
Customer and Stakeholder Liaison: Serve as the voice of the customer and business stakeholders, ensuring the development team fully understands the rationale (‚Äúwhy‚Äù) and objectives (‚Äúwhat‚Äù) behind product requirements.
Requirement Elicitation and Definition: Collaborate with business users and stakeholders to gather, analyze, and translate requirements into clear and detailed user stories with acceptance criteria suitable for development.
Solution Validation: Support evaluation and validation of product solutions, ensuring proposals align with the product vision, business goals, and technical feasibility‚Äî particularly within cloud-based environments.
Acceptance and Quality Assurance: Coordinate or conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to verify that completed features meet agreed acceptance criteria, business objectives, and quality standards.
Documentation: Prepare and maintain comprehensive product documentation, including feature specifications, user stories, process flows, and user manuals, ensuring alignment across teams and transparency in project execution

The successful applicants will carry out the following responsibilities:
Design and develop features based on customer requirements.
Develop new inspection algorithms using image processing/machine learning (ML) techniques
Maintain and optimize the performance of existing algorithms
Work with cross-functional teams (QA/SW/TS) to address software-related issues (Especially in memory leaks, hangs, crashes, etc.)
Manage the Unit Test to ensure high-quality source code
Develop tools for data collection and analysis to improve work performance
Integrate the developed algorithms to company‚Äôs common library.
Report work progress to the manager

This role of this job is to ensure that all security and/or monitoring software, computers, firewalls, servers, devices, appliances, and related IT infrastructure are up to date and configured based on existing MB Life corporate security rules, standard policies and procedures. This role requires the candidate to understand the security context and operational specifics of the BFSI industry, especially the integration and security protection of the core insurance system. The role also involves ensuring effective implementation of IT security practices within cloud environments (AWS, O365‚Ä¶). This role requires experience in the application of AI in cybersecurity operations such as threat detection, anomaly analysis, system monitoring, and automation. 
Ensures appropriate MB Life systems and/or devices are properly configured, updated and working appropriately to detect potential threats and security incidents.
Overseas and monitors the system security operations (cyber and internal) such as user account management, network vulnerability scanning, virus database update/scanning and other security measures (detailed below) are performed in accordance with existing MB Life standard policies and procedures.
Detection of anomalies, cyber threats and fraudulent use of computers and computer systems.
Security electronic communication (email and social media);
Protection of personal data and privacy.
Secure IT development with regards to MB Life business applications
Data masking, encryption, security testing, certification, digital signatures and Public Key Infrastructure
Provides support, education and training for all employees in terms of IT Security risk awareness within the organization.

Provides technical support, education and training to all employees in terms of IT Security risk awareness within the organization.
Provides technical support and/or recommendation on IT security technology that would help align MB Life with the latest technology and industry standards

  Who are we?

We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but also raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. We have been certified for 2022/23 as a ‚ÄòGreat Place to Work‚Äô in the APAC region. So, if you want to have the opportunity to work with an outstanding and progressive organization, this position could be right for you.

details.ground_truth:
Our mission at what3words is to become the global standard for addressing. Street addresses weren‚Äôt designed for 2025. They aren‚Äôt accurate enough to specify building entrances, and they don‚Äôt exist for parks, rural areas and many parts of the world. This makes it hard to find places and causes problems and inefficiencies on a global scale.
 That‚Äôs why we created what3words. We divided the world into 3m squares and gave each square a unique combination of three words. It‚Äôs the easiest way to find and share precise locations.
 In late 2024, we welcomed Swiftcomplete into the what3words family. Their expertise in fast, intelligent, and scalable address validation technology strengthens our ability to make location data even more accessible, accurate, and easy to use. Together, we‚Äôre building the most powerful addressing standard and address validation products in the world.
 Over the last year, what3words has been used in 193 countries, and our monthly active users continue to grow at an impressive pace. Our tech is used by emergency services, delivery companies, eCommerce businesses, ride-hailing apps and NGOs, and is integrated into the navigation systems of millions of cars around the world.

Who we‚Äôre looking for

We are looking for a Full Stack Staff Engineer to join our growing team of 25+ engineers in Ho Chi Minh City to own end‚Äëto‚Äëend delivery of an address autocomplete & validation app for Shopify, focusing on Checkout UI Extensions and app Admin configuration. This is an independent role (architecture ‚Üí code ‚Üí release). Work closely with Swiftcomplete Product Managers‚Äîwho define scope & functionality‚Äîand co‚Äëdesign based on your expertise.

Collaboration with Product Management

You‚Äôll work closely with Swiftcomplete Product Managers who own scope and business outcomes. They will collaborate with you in the design process and expect you to contribute options and trade‚Äëoffs based on your engineering experience.

contexts:
VSOL is a digital enabler with a mission to help public and private organizations evolve their businesses through data and technology. We provide an end-to-end service from consulting to execution that drives the growth and innovation of our clients. As VSOL is in a phase of rapid expansion, we offer a dynamic, creative environment that accelerates your personal and professional development. We are looking for talented individuals eager to develop in international markets while contributing to the company‚Äôs future in a constructive and supportive manner
 As a Python Technical Lead, you will be responsible for leading and mentoring a team of Python developers, designing scalable and robust software architectures. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on impactful projects, collaborate with international teams, and grow with us focused on innovation, excellence, and value creation.
 Key Responsibilities
Lead the architecture, design, and development of enterprise-grade Python applications and backend services.
Serve as the primary technical authority and provide strategic direction on Python technology stack, design patterns, and software methodologies.
Architect and implement scalable and secure systems using microservices, cloud-native designs, and distributed computing techniques.
Design and develop advanced backend services using Python and FastAPI.
Lead the deployment of scalable and secure applications with Kubernetes and containerization technologies.
Architect and manage complex databases using PostgreSQL, including advanced features and optimization.
Guide and mentor junior and senior developers in best practices, coding standards, and fostering an environment of continuous learning.
Oversee the integration of user-facing elements with server-side logic and API development.
Collaborate with stakeholders, executive leadership, and product management to refine backend features, drive product vision, and align technical initiatives with business goals.
Implement and oversee DevOps practices, including automation, monitoring, CI/CD pipelines, and performance tuning.
Drive innovation by evaluating emerging Python technologies, tools, and methodologies, and integrating them into the organization's technology strategy.
Take ownership of system reliability, scalability, and performance, proactively identifying and resolving bottlenecks.
Lead the technical delivery of complex projects, managing both internal development teams and external vendors.
Contribute to organization-wide architectural governance, ensuring consistency and alignment across multiple projects and teams.
Advocate for security best practices, implementing robust measures to safeguard data and systems.

THE ROLE 
We are looking for junior or fresh graduate Python Software Engineers who are excited to build scalable systems, learn modern technologies, and leverage AI-powered development to accelerate engineering work. 
 
You will join our core team to develop components for our research and trading platform, including backend services, data pipelines, automation, and internal tooling. 
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES 
- Build and maintain backend services, automation scripts, and internal tools using Python. 
- Work with structured and unstructured data ‚Äî ingestion, transformation, validation, and storage. 
- Write clean, maintainable, and modular code using Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles. 
- Assist in optimizing performance, reliability, and scalability. 
- Collaborate with researchers to translate ideas into runnable systems. 
- Actively use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, GitHub Copilot, etc.) for coding, debugging, documentation, and design. 
- Participate in code reviews, knowledge sharing, and engineering improvements. 
- Learn and adapt to modern DevOps practices (Git, Docker, CI/CD, cloud or container platforms).

üîπ Job Summary
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer (Python/Django) to join our engineering team. You will play a key role in designing, building, and optimizing backend systems that are scalable, secure, maintainable, and aligned with long-term product strategy.  You will also mentor junior engineers, participate in architectural discussions, and contribute to solving complex technical challenges across the platform.
üîπ Key Responsibilities
Team Collaboration & Delivery
Participate in daily Scrum meetings; report progress, planned tasks, and blockers.  
Work closely with Design, Frontend, and QC teams to deliver features that meet both business and technical requirements.  
Ensure high code quality by following Clean Code, linting standards, Conventional Commit rules, and ensuring all QC test cases are passed.
System Design & Development
Design, build, and optimize backend architecture for scalability, performance, security, maintainability, and reliability.  
Develop and maintain RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and inter-service communication layers.  
Participate in system improvement initiatives and contribute ideas for architectural enhancement.  
Leadership & Mentorship
Review code, provide feedback, and mentor junior/mid-level engineers.  
Share best practices, guidelines, and technical knowledge with the team.

Ideal candidates have 2‚Äì3 years of experience after graduation as a Business Analyst in software or enduser projects and aspire to advance into a Product Owner (PO) role in a few years. The APO will bridge business needs and technical execution, working with the businesses to define the roadmap, refine requirements, and translate them into actionable development tasks that deliver measurable business value.
Experience with web or mobile business applications in cloud environments is highly preferred, along with a solid understanding of web, mobile, and database technologies and the stages of modern application development.
Key Responsibilities
As an Associate Product Owner, you will collaborate closely with key stakeholders,and technical teams to ensure the successful design and delivery of solutions that align with business goals.
Product Backlog Management: Work with the Businesses to define, refine, and prioritize backlog items (user stories, features, epics) based on business value, technical feasibility, and alignment with product strategy.
Customer and Stakeholder Liaison: Serve as the voice of the customer and business stakeholders, ensuring the development team fully understands the rationale (‚Äúwhy‚Äù) and objectives (‚Äúwhat‚Äù) behind product requirements.
Requirement Elicitation and Definition: Collaborate with business users and stakeholders to gather, analyze, and translate requirements into clear and detailed user stories with acceptance criteria suitable for development.
Solution Validation: Support evaluation and validation of product solutions, ensuring proposals align with the product vision, business goals, and technical feasibility‚Äî particularly within cloud-based environments.
Acceptance and Quality Assurance: Coordinate or conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to verify that completed features meet agreed acceptance criteria, business objectives, and quality standards.
Documentation: Prepare and maintain comprehensive product documentation, including feature specifications, user stories, process flows, and user manuals, ensuring alignment across teams and transparency in project execution

We are a global product team focused on building payment and e-commerce solutions that make an impact. We have dedicated our efforts to assisting merchants in running online businesses and reaching customers in every country in the world.
Who Are We Looking For
We‚Äôre looking for a proactive and results-driven Product Manager who thrives in fast-paced environments and is passionate about building impactful solutions. You should be strategic, customer-focused, and execution-oriented ‚Äî capable of translating business needs into product strategy, aligning cross-functional teams, and driving the end-to-end product lifecycle from discovery to launch. If you excel at identifying opportunities, shipping valuable features, and continuously improving products based on data and feedback, this role is for you.
HONESTY and TRUST are core to who we are. We expect transparent and truthful communication from all our team members.
LEARNING and CURIOSITY are essential for growth here. You bring fresh ideas, creativity, and a desire to develop daily, absorbing knowledge from those around you.
Multilingual and Multilingual? Even better. You embrace international collaboration and thrive in global environments. Bonus points if you have cross-border experience or fluency in multiple languages.
Position Overview
As the Product Manager, you will drive the development and enhancement of our AI-powered global identity platform. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver a product that not only meets rigorous compliance standards but also provides an exceptional user experience across our diverse client base spanning 190+ countries.
What You Will Do
Lead the strategic planning and execution platform development, ensuring alignment with our vision of becoming the gold standard in identity verification
Orchestrate the implementation of advanced AI/ML technologies that power our automated verification processes, including state-of-the-art OCR, Face ID, Voice ID, Anti-deepfake, etc
Manage the development of our multimodal verification capabilities spanning ID document processing, face liveness verification, and AML screening across 200+ languages
Coordinate with engineering teams to enhance our microservice architecture, ensuring scalability and flexibility as our user base grows
Drive the continuous improvement of our REST APIs and SDKs for major platforms, facilitating seamless integration for our clients
Collaborate with data scientists and AI specialists to refine our dynamic risk assessment models and ensure they remain at the cutting edge of fraud detection
Balance the implementation of automated verification with human expert oversight to maintain the highest levels of accuracy and integrity
Ensure all platform developments adhere to global compliance standards and prioritize data privacy and security

Perform development & testing features/bugs from backlog items.
Response quickly to handle incidents if it happens.
Build and maintain the CI/CD.
Be Involved in Quality Assurance with good processes, practices, and analysis tools.
Be Involved in developing Non-Functional Requirements (e.g. Performance, Security, Reliability, Maintainability‚Ä¶)
Assists leaders to define Technical Backlog
Be Involved in defining Roadmap and Risk Management.
Responsible for being committed to the results to be delivered by his/her team and assists his/her teams in achieving such results.
Responsible for objectively and effectively communicating with his/her counterparts, leaders, and team members
Responsible for providing his/her team with feedback on their work.

We are seeking an experienced Database Site Reliability Engineer (DBSRE) to support and operate enterprise-scale, mission-critical database platforms across PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL/MariaDB, and Microsoft SQL Server. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in high availability, performance tuning, disaster recovery.
 ‚Ä¢ Install, configure, and manage PostgreSQL (Patroni), MongoDB replica sets, MySQL/MariaDB HA, and MS SQL Server Always On in production environments.
‚Ä¢ Ensure high availability, replication, and automated failover for mission-critical databases.

‚Ä¢ Maintain SOPs, technical documentation, architecture diagrams, and operational runbooks.
‚Ä¢ Participate in 24x7 on-call rotations, resolve incidents, and ensure SLA adherence.

Troubleshoot and resolve issues in development, test, and production environments.

Please note: This position is open to both Vietnamese & Japanese candidates.
 Job Overview: We are seeking a visionary and technically accomplished CTO/ Head of AI (Japanese N2+) to define and execute NECVN‚Äôs AI strategy, ensure alignment with NEC HQ, and lead the development of innovative AI solutions that deliver measurable value to customers. This role combines strategic leadership with deep technical expertise in artificial intelligence.
 Develop and lead NECVN‚Äôs AI strategy in alignment with NEC HQ‚Äôs global technology roadmap.
Act as a strategic and technical liaison between NECVN and NEC HQ, ensuring smooth collaboration and knowledge transfer.
Lead the AI engineering team in researching, designing, and deploying advanced AI solutions
Translate customer and business requirements into scalable AI architectures and solutions.
Oversee the full AI lifecycle: from data acquisition and model development to deployment and monitoring.
Ensure technical excellence, innovation, and compliance with global standards in all AI initiatives.
Evaluate and adopt emerging AI technologies and methodologies to maintain NECVN‚Äôs competitive edge.
Collaborate cross-functionally to integrate AI into broader digital transformation efforts and enterprise solutions.

Key Responsibilities
AI ENGINEER
Work closely as a project team as the main contributor in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Developing scalable AI systems and designing/building algorithms that automate predictive data models.
Creating and managing the AI development and production infrastructure, including automating AI infrastructures for data science teams.

details.question:
Here is a perfect match resume for the IT Security Solution job:

John Doe
Address: 123 Main St, Anytown, USA 12345
Phone: (123) 456-7890
Email: [johndoe@email.com](mailto:johndoe@email.com)

Objective:
To obtain an IT Security Solution position at MB Life, where I can utilize my skills and experience to ensure the implementation of approved IT security policies and procedures across the organization.

Summary:
Highly motivated and experienced IT security professional with 8+ years of experience in the BFSI industry. Proven track record of implementing and maintaining secure IT systems and infrastructure. Skilled in cloud security (AWS, O365), AI-powered cybersecurity operations, threat detection, anomaly analysis, and security testing. Strong understanding of IT security policies, procedures, and industry standards.

Technical Skills:
- Cloud security (AWS, O365)
- AI-powered cybersecurity operations (threat detection, anomaly analysis)
- Security testing and certification (penetration testing, vulnerability scanning)
- Data masking, encryption, and digital signatures
- Public Key Infrastructure (PKI)
- Firewalls, servers, devices, and appliances configuration and management
- Network vulnerability scanning and virus database update/scanning
- User account management and security electronic communication (email and social media)
- IT security risk awareness and training

Professional Experience:
IT Security Specialist, ABC Insurance Company (2018-Present)
- Implemented and maintained secure IT systems and infrastructure, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations
- Configured and managed firewalls, servers, devices, and appliances to detect potential threats and security incidents
- Conducted network vulnerability scanning, virus database updates, and security testing to identify and mitigate security risks
- Developed and implemented IT security policies and procedures, including incident response and disaster recovery plans
- Provided technical support and training to employees on IT security risk awareness and best practices
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure secure IT development and implementation of business applications

Senior IT Security Analyst, DEF Financial Services (2015-2018)
- Designed and implemented cloud security solutions (AWS, O365) to ensure secure data storage and transmission
- Developed and implemented AI-powered cybersecurity operations, including threat detection and anomaly analysis
- Conducted security audits and risk assessments to identify and mitigate security vulnerabilities
- Provided technical support and recommendations on IT security technology to align with industry standards and best practices
- Collaborated with incident response teams to investigate and respond to security incidents

Education:
- Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, XYZ University (2010-2014)
- Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
- Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP)
- Certified Information Security Manager (CISM)

Certifications:
- CompTIA Security+
- CompTIA Cloud+
- AWS Certified Security - Specialty
- Microsoft Certified: Azure Security Engineer Associate

Soft Skills:
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work in a team environment and collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
- Ability to adapt to changing IT security landscape and industry standards
- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
- Ability to provide technical support and training to employees on IT security risk awareness and best practices

References:
Available upon request.
contexts:
The primary role of IT Security Solution job is to ensure that approved IT security policies, rules and/or configurations are implemented across MB Life IT security systems and its Infrastructure. This role of this job is to ensure that all security and/or monitoring software, computers, firewalls, servers, devices, appliances, and related IT infrastructure are up to date and configured based on existing MB Life corporate security rules, standard policies and procedures. This role requires the candidate to understand the security context and operational specifics of the BFSI industry, especially the integration and security protection of the core insurance system. The role also involves ensuring effective implementation of IT security practices within cloud environments (AWS, O365‚Ä¶). This role requires experience in the application of AI in cybersecurity operations such as threat detection, anomaly analysis, system monitoring, and automation. 
Ensures appropriate MB Life systems and/or devices are properly configured, updated and working appropriately to detect potential threats and security incidents.
Overseas and monitors the system security operations (cyber and internal) such as user account management, network vulnerability scanning, virus database update/scanning and other security measures (detailed below) are performed in accordance with existing MB Life standard policies and procedures.
Detection of anomalies, cyber threats and fraudulent use of computers and computer systems.
Security electronic communication (email and social media);
Protection of personal data and privacy.
Secure IT development with regards to MB Life business applications
Data masking, encryption, security testing, certification, digital signatures and Public Key Infrastructure
Provides support, education and training for all employees in terms of IT Security risk awareness within the organization.
Performs audits, reviews, analyses and report submission of security log files as described in approved IT security policies.
Participates in the review of investigations after breaches or incidents, including impact analysis and recommendations for avoiding similar vulnerabilities.
Provides technical support, education and training to all employees in terms of IT Security risk awareness within the organization.
Provides technical support and/or recommendation on IT security technology that would help align MB Life with the latest technology and industry standards

Protect. Innovate. Lead the Future of Secure Tech.
At DIGI-TEXX, we‚Äôre not just building smart solutions - we‚Äôre securing the future of digital innovation. As a trusted tech partner delivering cutting-edge AI/ML-powered services, we believe cybersecurity is the foundation of everything we build.
We‚Äôre on the lookout for a passionate, hands-on Cybersecurity Engineer who‚Äôs excited by challenges, thrives in a fast-paced environment, and wants to make a real impact.
  What You‚Äôll Own & Drive
Develop and maintain systems that reliably monitor and respond to security incidents and threats in real-time
Implement and maintain firewalls, Intrusion Detection/Prevention Systems (IDS/IPS), endpoint protection, and other key tools
Run vulnerability scans, penetration tests, and security audits
Design and enforce security policies, standards, and best practices
Collaborate with DevOps and IT teams to build secure infrastructure from the ground up
Stay one step ahead with the latest security trends, risks, and mitigation techniques
 Working location: 2nd Floor, Anna Building, Quang Trung Software City, District 12, HCMC
Working time: 8:00 AM - 5:50 PM, Monday to Friday
Department: Technology
Report to: CTO

The successful applicants will carry out the following responsibilities:
Design and develop features based on customer requirements.
Develop new inspection algorithms using image processing/machine learning (ML) techniques
Maintain and optimize the performance of existing algorithms
Work with cross-functional teams (QA/SW/TS) to address software-related issues (Especially in memory leaks, hangs, crashes, etc.)
Manage the Unit Test to ensure high-quality source code
Develop tools for data collection and analysis to improve work performance
Integrate the developed algorithms to company‚Äôs common library.
Report work progress to the manager

details.question:
Here is a perfect match resume for the Software Architect position at OL Vietnam:

John Doe
Software Architect
Contact: johndoe@email.com | (123) 456-7890 | LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/johndoe

Summary:
Highly experienced Software Architect with 10+ years of experience in designing and implementing scalable, secure, and maintainable software systems. Proven track record of leading engineering teams and establishing architectural vision and technical stewardship. Skilled in containerization, orchestration, data flow, and security. Passionate about building flexible, scalable, and streamlined systems that elevate business management.

Technical Skills:
- Programming languages: Java, Python, C++, JavaScript
- Containerization: Docker, Kubernetes
- Orchestration: Kubernetes, Apache Mesos
- Data storage: Relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL), NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Cassandra), caching (Redis, Memcached)
- Cloud platforms: Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
- Agile methodologies: Scrum, Kanban
- Version control: Git, SVN
- CI/CD tools: Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, CircleCI
- Security: Authentication and authorization, least privilege, encryption

Professional Experience:
Software Architect, ABC Company (2018-Present)
- Defined and evolved the target architecture, principles, and roadmaps for multiple software systems
- Led system design for major initiatives, clarifying domain boundaries and modularization
- Established standards for build, packaging, runtime environments, configuration, and secrets
- Contributed to paved paths for CI/CD, release strategies, and fast rollbacks
- Mentored engineers and tech leads, raising documentation quality and creating reference implementations
- Collaborated with product, platform, and security teams to translate business goals into architecture roadmaps

Senior Software Engineer, DEF Company (2015-2018)
- Designed and implemented multiple software systems using microservices architecture
- Led the adoption of containerization and orchestration using Docker and Kubernetes
- Developed and implemented data flow patterns, recommending persistence choices and ensuring backup and restore considerations
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software systems

Education:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, XYZ University (2010-2014)

Certifications:
- Certified Software Architect, IEEE Computer Society
- Certified Kubernetes Administrator, Cloud Native Computing Foundation

Soft Skills:
- Strong leadership and communication skills
- Ability to lead by influence and facilitate critical design decisions
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
- Strong collaboration and teamwork skills
- Ability to mentor and guide engineers and tech leads
- Strong attention to detail and quality focus

Achievements:
- Designed and implemented a scalable e-commerce platform using microservices architecture, resulting in a 300% increase in sales
- Led the adoption of containerization and orchestration, reducing deployment time by 50% and increasing system reliability by 90%
- Developed and implemented a data flow pattern, resulting in a 25% reduction in data processing time and a 30% increase in data quality

References:
Available upon request.
contexts:
At OL Vietnam, we have worked alongside our parent company, Orange Logic LLC, to support some of the world‚Äôs largest enterprises with their digital asset management needs. Orange Logic provides a premier Digital Asset Management (DAM) platform that streamlines workflows, enhances collaboration, and ensures compliance across complex digital ecosystems, empowering any team working with digital content the ability to efficiently create, manage, and distribute their content at scale.
 WHAT DIFFERENTIATES ORANGE LOGIC
We are trusted by global leaders to work with over 100 customers, including many of the world's most recognized brands.
Our business is strong and resilient, even in the face of economic challenges. During the Covid economic downturn, we did not implement layoffs or reduce compensation. Instead, we continued to grow, consistently expanding our team and adding dozens of talented members to our R&D department each year.
You‚Äôll work with top engineers and team members who are passionate about building flexible, scalable, and streamlined systems that will define the future of business management.
Job Summary: We are seeking a seasoned Software Architect to establish the architectural vision and technical stewardship for OL Vietnam. In this role, you won't just design systems; you will empower our engineering teams by creating clear architectural principles, patterns, and "paved roads" that enable them to build scalable, secure, and maintainable software with velocity. You will lead by influence‚Äîfacilitating critical design decisions, mentoring engineers, and translating business strategy into a tangible technical roadmap that elevates our entire platform and application landscape.
 Essential Functions:
Architecture Strategy & Governance: Define and evolve the target architecture, principles, tech radar, and roadmaps; steward ADRs; facilitate architecture/design reviews; ensure decisions and trade‚Äëoffs are documented and communicated.
Application Architecture: Lead or facilitate system design for major initiatives; clarify domain boundaries and modularization; guide performance and reliability patterns (caching, concurrency/async, idempotency, retries/timeouts, graceful degradation).
Platform Architecture & Developer Experience: Establish standards for build/packaging, runtime environments, configuration and secrets, and environment promotion (dev/stage/prod); contribute paved paths (templates, reference repos) for CI/CD, release strategies (e.g., canary/blue‚Äëgreen when useful), and fast rollbacks.
Hands-on Leadership & Execution: Lead by example by contributing directly to complex technical challenges, reference implementations, and critical proof-of-concepts. Prove your architectural standards are effective and pragmatic through hands-on implementation.
Containerization & Orchestration: Validate containerization and orchestration approaches during architectural reviews; align implementations with golden paths.
Data & Flow: Align integration and data‚Äëflow patterns; recommend persistence choices (relational/NoSQL/search/cache) appropriate to use cases; ensure backup/restore considerations are in place.
Delivery & Enablement: Create reference implementations and migration plans; mentor engineers and tech leads; raise documentation quality (C4, sequence diagrams, RFCs/ADRs, onboarding guides).
Stakeholder Leadership: Translate business goals into architecture roadmaps with measurable outcomes; collaborate with product, platform/infra, and security teams.
Security & Quality Fundamentals: Champion security by design (authn/z, least privilege, encryption) and the adoption of baseline quality gates within the SDLC by partnering closely with platform and security teams.

Our Tech stack:
Our core services consist hundreds of Golang microservices built around domain oriented, event driven architecture. All run on GCP, GKE, Istio with autoscaling, resiliency and chaos engineering mindset with full end to end observability.
Our mobile platform was running on Android/iOS/Flutter, component based, composable architecture. Web app largely on TypeScript, React, NextJS, Tailwind CSS and composable in-house design components and framework. 
Gitlab for all code repository, CI/CD, with Backstage as centralized developer productivity platform.
DevOps culture, you are fully responsible with design, build, and operate your own services with support from SRE, Platform team as needed
Open source lover, and open source contributor. All tooling and platforms used was in-house custom built on popular open source projects
Embraced engineering culture, and agile development.
Spirit
Accept failures, learn from it and move extremely fast. 
Flexible working environment, and performance-based optimization focus
Ownership and excellent learning opportunity, in-house and external
Be part of the team, who set the trend, influence and build meaningful product to millions of fello Vietnamese
Responsibilities:
You will work closely with the Product, UX/UI and Backend teams to design, build new products, platforms and features.
More senior engineers will act as a role model and mentor to more junior members.
Build re-usable Android software components for the Be platform.
Collaborate with QA on continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) as well as other automated and manual testing to make sure our app release cycles
You will monitor the performance of the live apps and continuously improve them on both code and experience level.
Design, build and improve the mobile experiences for one of the world's fastest growing mobile app in ride-hailing, payments and logistics.
Provide technology leadership to the team and foster engineering excellence.
Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Help maintain code quality, organization and automatization

Our Tech stack:
Our core services consist hundreds of Golang microservices built around domain oriented, event driven architecture. All run on GCP, GKE, Istio with autoscaling, resiliency and chaos engineering mindset with full end to end observability.
Our mobile platform was running on Android/iOS/Flutter, component based, composable architecture. Web app largely on TypeScript, React, NextJS, Tailwind CSS and composable in-house design components and framework. 
Gitlab for all code repository, CI/CD, with Backstage as centralized developer productivity platform.
DevOps culture, you are fully responsible with design, build, and operate your own services with support from SRE, Platform team as needed
Open source lover, and open source contributor. All tooling and platforms used was in-house custom built on popular open source projects
Embraced engineering culture, and agile development.
Spirit
Accept failures, learn from it and move extremely fast. 
Flexible working environment, and performance-based optimization focus
Ownership and excellent learning opportunity, in-house and external
Be part of the team, who set the trend, influence and build meaningful product to millions of fello Vietnamese

You will work closely with the Product, UX/UI and Backend teams to design, build new products, platforms and features.
More senior engineers will act as a role model and mentor to more junior members.
Build re-usable Android software components for the Be platform.
Collaborate with QA on continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) as well as other automated and manual testing to make sure our app release cycles
You will monitor the performance of the live apps and continuously improve them on both code and experience level.
Design, build and improve the mobile experiences for one of the world's fastest growing mobile app in ride-hailing, payments and logistics.
Provide technology leadership to the team and foster engineering excellence.
Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Help maintain code quality, organization and automatization

contexts:
Trusting Social is an AI Fintech pioneer that's revolutionizing credit access in emerging markets. Our mission is "Advancing AI to Meet the Financial Needs of Everyday Consumers with Empathy." We've assessed over 1 billion consumers across four countries, and we're on a mission to provide 100 million credit lines using the power of AI and Big Data.
How You'll Make an Impact
As a Data Scientist, eKYC at Trusting Social, you will be instrumental in building cutting-edge digital identity verification products for our eKYC (electronic Know Your Customer) projects. Your expertise in machine learning and computer vision will be crucial for developing robust systems to prevent fraud and money laundering. This role offers the opportunity to make a significant impact on revenue while also enhancing financial security, aligning with our strong social mission.
What You'll Do
Develop Advanced ML Models: Build various machine learning models in computer vision, implementing novel solutions for diverse ML problems (supervised, semi-supervised, unsupervised, one-class).
Research & Implement Cutting-Edge Algorithms: Research, design, and implement advanced ML models and algorithms to solve practical problems, optimizing for both performance and speed.
Build Practical Vision Systems: Work with high-dimensional image and video data to develop practical vision systems with a direct impact on revenue and profitability.
Optimize for Deployment: Optimize and deploy "tiny" ML solutions for limited computation power devices like mobile and web platforms.

Key Responsibilities
AI ENGINEER
Work closely as a project team as the main contributor in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Developing scalable AI systems and designing/building algorithms that automate predictive data models.
Creating and managing the AI development and production infrastructure, including automating AI infrastructures for data science teams.
Participating in all phases of AI solutions development, from requirements definition and design to development, deployment, integration, maintenance, performance tuning, and monitoring.
Collaborating extensively with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to define project requirements, ensure seamless progress, and facilitate AI adoption and best practices.
Driving scalability improvements and introducing new capabilities in machine learning platforms, often working across the full stack on tools and infrastructure that empower machine learning teams.
DATA SCIENTIST
Work closely as a project team to lead in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Owns planning of assigned modules, contributes to task breakdown, estimation, and milestone alignment, and supports backlog grooming discussions.
Leads development of a complete module or sub-system (e.g., full model training pipeline or certain solution direction). Can propose solution design, test, and iterate independently. Coordinates with project lead to align with project needs.
Proactively explores and evaluates new tools or methods relevant to the problem domain and integrates them into module-level components with minimal supervision.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Proactive in contributing to the growth of internal capabilities (e.g., training, knowledge-sharing, framework design).

The successful applicants will carry out the following responsibilities:
Design and develop features based on customer requirements.
Develop new inspection algorithms using image processing/machine learning (ML) techniques
Maintain and optimize the performance of existing algorithms
Work with cross-functional teams (QA/SW/TS) to address software-related issues (Especially in memory leaks, hangs, crashes, etc.)
Manage the Unit Test to ensure high-quality source code
Develop tools for data collection and analysis to improve work performance
Integrate the developed algorithms to company‚Äôs common library.
Report work progress to the manager

- Database architecture and schema design for structured and unstructured data.
- System integration with third-party APIs, services, and enterprise systems.
- Security monitoring, and scalability considerations to ensure enterprise-grade robustness.
 4. Backend Algorithm and AI Development (Better to have)
‚Ä¢ Design and implement core backend services, with a strong emphasis on AI-driven capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Key areas include:
- Generative AI (GenAI) integration, including standard Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) frameworks.
- Graph-based RAG approaches to enhance context linking and retrieval accuracy.
- AI Agent development for orchestration, task automation, and reasoning workflows.
- Data intake pipelines to support structured and unstructured data ingestion.
- Information retrieval systems optimized for speed, scalability, and relevance.
